itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway and Jessie Wiseman welcome special guest Eric Tansey to bring you the realest fake news of the week with the “We want to work” protests happening in cities across the US, California cutting $500 stimulus checks for illegal immigrants, why Americans are streaming 8 hours a day in quarantimes, Dr. Fauci endorses hooking up on Tinder, Coronavirus bailout checks area at risk of being taken by debt collectors, and discuss why John Krasinski and David Ortiz won citizens of the week.
